javelin.model

Class BattleMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • tyrant.mikera.engine.BaseObject
      • javelin.model.BattleMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, tyrant.mikera.engine.ThingOwner

    public class BattleMap
extends tyrant.mikera.engine.BaseObject
implements tyrant.mikera.engine.ThingOwner
    The root class for all maps in the tyrant universe Map contains a wide variety of functions for creating and drawing map elements, and also for managing the set of all objects placed on the map All specific types of map (dungeons, towns etc) should extend Map Some particularly useful Map creation functions: setTile copyArea fillArea fillBorder rotateArea Particularly useful object management functions: addThing getThings Some useful AI helper functions getMobile getNearbyMobile countNearbyMobiles findNearestFoe Note: Map is final for performance reasons
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
